name: Solano County Library 24/7 Digital Library
description: Free 24/7 digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Solano County library card
fullDescription: Solano County Library provides 24/7 digital library resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming media, and online learning for cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming video and music
- Online learning platforms
- Research databases
- Digital magazines and newspapers
- Available 24/7
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Solano County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit solanolibrary.com/247-digital-library
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content anytime, on any device
